select * from ( select c.product_id as productId,b.pic as img,b.name as title,c.sku_code as skuCode,b.create_time from xms_customer_sku_stock c, xms_customer_product a, pms_product b where a.member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and c.product_id = a.product_id and a.product_id = b.id
and b.name like concat('%',#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
group by c.product_id,c.sku_code) rs order by rs.create_time desc
limit #{pageNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
